rounds.title: Cartoon Quest
rounds.description: In this round participants (Individual) will have to guess the cartoon based on the clues (pics/sound) showed to them.

rounds.title: Kicking It
rounds.description: In this round participants (DUO) will be provided balloons & they will compete with their opponents. Last one to survive will move to next round.

rounds.title: Ludo
rounds.description: As the name itself suggests it will be a game of ludo but with some twists. So first team to complete wins the Prize.

rounds.title: Friendly Feud
rounds.description: question will be asked and their answers will be judged on basis of google top 10 results.

rounds.title: Friendly fire
rounds.description: on red light players have to throw as many pingpong balls in cup when light turns green they have to stop throwing.

rounds.title: Unfriend
rounds.description: Questions will be asked and team with correct answer has to pickup a box if it contains prize money that team wins if it doesn't this process willl be repeated.

rounds.title: Movie Mania
rounds.description: This is a scribble round were there will be movie names in form of emoji's.

rounds.title: Quest for Heros
rounds.description: In this round each group has to form a circle and every participant will be given a balloon and they have to write their name on it.Music will be played and participant will move the balloons in circle when the music stops ,participant has to pop the balloon, every balloon has a chit inside it with names of heroes and villain, First person sitting in the circle will get a dice and whatever number comes on it. that balloon will be popped.People who pop the balloon with names of villain on it, will be eliminated.

rounds.title: End Game
rounds.description: This round is a "TREASURE HUNT" round where participants have to find six Infinity stones by clues provided to you, in which the hint of last stone will be same for all, and the first one to find and bring will be the winner.

rounds.title: Elimination Round
rounds.description: 5-5 teams will be formed

rounds.title: The Shield Dodge
rounds.description: 2 shield will be given to two random players from the team to defend themselves.

rounds.title: Defend If You Can
rounds.description: 1 shield will be given to two random players from the team to defend themselves.

rounds.title: MemeVaganza - Aao thodi Dialogue Baazi Karein
rounds.description: 20 templates will be provided to the participants,they will have to guess the famous dialogues

rounds.title: Memeflix
rounds.description: Paricipants have to guess the memes based on audio that will be proivided, 30 participants will be selected for the next round.

rounds.title: Meme Charades
rounds.description: This Is A Duo Round In Which Participants Will Need To Complete A Specific Task In Order To Get A Meme Template About Which They Have Act It Out To Their Teammate

rounds.title: Meme It
rounds.description: 6 participants will be selected for this round and they will be provided 3 templates and a theme(any current issue) and they have to create 3 memes based on the theme

events.title: BIG BOSS
events.desc: Let your Intelligence have Fun!

rounds.title: ALPHABETIZE THE CUPS
rounds.description: This round is physical and concentration skills. Participants will perform this round at their specific table which is allotted to them. Two Duos  will have to compete against each other and arrange the cups in alphabetical order from A to Z. The First duo to arrange the cups correctly will qualify further .

rounds.title: Paper ke parinde
rounds.description: Participants will be given a set of papers, They will have to make paper planes and pass it through the circular ring in the given time. Elimination will be based on number of paper passed through by one duo in given time limit.

rounds.title: BUCKET TWIST
rounds.description: Twister is a game of physical skill. It is played on a large plastic mat that is spread on the floor or ground. The mat has six rows of large colored circles on it with a different color in each row: red, yellow, green, and blue. THE LAST ONE STANDING IN THE TWISTER GAME WILL BE THE WINNER OF BIG BOSS.
